title: Prometheus dependency provider
description: Discover service dependencies from Prometheus metrics. Queries: http_client_requests_total, grpc_client_handled_total, db_client_connections, redis_client_commands_total, kafka_consumer_records_consumed_total. Supports upstream and downstream discovery, custom patterns, health check. Files: src/nthlayer/dependencies/providers/prometheus.py, base.py. Tests: tests/test_deps_provider_prometheus.py.
